section_home.introduction:
Hi, my name is Matias Poses
I'm a Fullstack Developer
based in Argentina.

section_aboutme.about_description: I started learning Python because i needed to find a better way to do things in my work and since that i didnt stop learning others leanguages. Now i realized that i want to do this for a living. Now, im currently working in a electrical company in my city where i am in charged of a sector responsible of documenting all the electrical wires of the city with AutoCAD. I can work part-time in any project, big or small, and demostrate all my new abilities as programmer.

projects.title: BLOG
projects.description: This a blog that i did for a course in Coderhouse. I had to use Django, HTML and CSS. I really like Django for the backend and im going to learn more so i can make bigger projects with this incredible framework.

projects.title: Calculator
projects.description: This calculator was a project from The Odin Project. I did all the Foundation course and i learned JAVASCRIPT, CSS and HTML.
